item.title: Go fundamentals, how to play?

item.title: Go Proverbs, how to play?

item.title: Go-micro, how to play cli?
item.description: Go-micro 简介 一句话介绍 Go Micro CLI is the command line interface for developing Go Micro projects. 开始表演 安装 1 go install github.com/go-micro/cli/cmd/go-micro@latest 创建测试项目（执行命令，后续根据命令提示操作） 1 go-micro new service helloworld 创建工程化项目（执行命

item.title: Go-micro, how to play introduction?
item.description: Go-micro 简介 一句话介绍 Go Micro is a framework for distributed systems development. 多说两句 Go Micro provides the core requirements for distributed systems development including RPC and Event driven communication. The Go Micro philosophy is sane defaults with a pluggable architecture. We provide defaults to get you started quickly but everything can be easily swapped out. 介绍下具体功能

item.title: Go io, how to play?
item.description: Go 的IO 首要问题，内核中的缓冲和进程中的缓冲 内核中的缓冲 无论进程是否提供缓冲，内核都是提供缓冲的，系统对磁盘的读写都会提供一个缓冲（page
